nodes.text: Ururur was a Tusken Raider who lived on the desert planet of Tatooine during the early years of the Galactic Civil War. Ururur was the leader of a Tusken tribe. Ururur wore desert-colored robes and the standard Tusken mask, and wielded a Gaderffii. As a tribe leader, Ururur made harsh laws with severe penalties as it was the only way to maintain control.
Ururur was first mentioned on a card in the 2001 Masters of the Force expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
